column2: Show all world cheat options, These cheats typicaly focus of global effects or area effects. This catagory is notably more random however.
All nations assimilate their populations based on their primary culture.
All nations that are able to release one puppet each time the option is used.
Show all union cheat options, These cheats focus on the formation of nations.
Allows you to form North Germany, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Italy, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Scandinavia, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Gran Columbia, Can be done as any nation.
Forms a generic cultural union based on your primary culture type, Can be done as any nation.
World population is halfed. Your game may run faster but will be less dynamic.
World population is doubled. You game may run slower but will be more dynamic.
Allows you to form Gran Columbia, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form the South German Federation, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Greater Germany, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Arabia, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Argentina, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Austria-Hungary, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Danubian Federation, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Turkolour Empire, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Romania, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Czechoslovakia, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Yugoslavia, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form the United Baltic Dutchy/Baltic Union, Can be done as any nation. Includes Lithuania.
Allows you to form Peru-Bolivia, Can be done as any nation.
Allows you to form Babylon, Can be done as any nation.
As a vassal become independent peacefully.
Trigger a war for independence as a vassal.
Trigger a civil war as a vassal.
All vassals declare war on their overlords for independence. Does not work in conjunction with Anarchy Mode 1, If anyone can figure out why this bug occurs please post on Moddb for this mod.
Disable vassals declearing war on their overlords.
All vassals of this state declear war for independence.

Research the last three lines of army and navy technologies.
Research the first three lines of financial technologies.
Research the last three lines of financial technologies.(With the exception of Government Interventionism).
Research the Government Interventionism technology. Is usualy researched after the discovery of oil (Approximately 1870).
Research the Behaviorism & Psychoanalysis technology. Is usualy researched after the discovery of electricity.
Research the Behaviorism technology. Is usualy researched after the discovery of electricity.
Research the last three lines of cultural technologies. (With the exception of Behaviorism & Psychoanalysis).

Research the first three lines of cultural technologies.
